column4: anyone know how i can change the theme of the gnome loading screen?  i changed gdm and gnome themes but the loading screen is still the brown human theme...
you're talking about after you enter your user/pass but before it loads your theme?
yes, where it shows the status window for gnome startup
ah yes.  v. true.   talisein  to store the result of a command in a variable you use either  FOO=$(command)  or FOO=`command`b
he can't get to anything outside his lan
he doesn't have his default route set right
no, i'm still getting a password prompt
did you restart the acpi daemon?
that looks fine.. it should work if you restart the acpi daemons.. You may also need to restart acpi-support and apmd but it should really work with just acpid restarted
